org.dyn4j.collision.broadphase

Class DynamicAABBTree<E extends Collidable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.collision.broadphase.AbstractAABBDetector<E>
      • org.dyn4j.collision.broadphase.DynamicAABBTree<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the Collidable type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BroadphaseDetector<E>

    public class DynamicAABBTree<E extends Collidable>
extends AbstractAABBDetector<E>
implements BroadphaseDetector<E>
    Implementation of an axis-aligned bounding box tree.

    This class uses a self-balancing binary tree to store the AABBs. The AABBs are sorted using the perimeter. The perimeter hueristic is better than area for 2D because axis aligned segments have zero area.

    Since:
    3.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.5
    Author:
    William Bittle

      • validate

        protected void validate(DynamicAABBTree.Node node)
        Internal recursive method used to validate the state of the subtree with the given node as the root.

        Used for testing only. Test using the -ea flag on the command line.

        Parameters:
        node - the root of the subtree to validate
